fields.name: Spelling mistake correction
fields.description: Correct the spelling mistakes in the following sentence

fields.question: I switched off d cell, removed battery,sd card ,sim and then put them back and restarted but still no luck :( Then i installed GPS ESSENTIALS from android market.launched the application and changed settingsGps update interval -> 10 secondsTracking update interval -> 10 secondsafter this tapped on "satellites" on main screen.(outside my room)I couldn't believe my eyes. it detected 8 satellites in few seconds and even it was able to lock to 7 of them.
just reived one of these (Sim Free, UK Version, Android 2.3 with Sense UI) , can anybody point me towards the simplest and most easy way to Root one?
please not that merely showing Bengali characters won't help.
I am finding problem to connect my android mobile to server on a windows machine.
